sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ResumeProfilsComponent} from "../../pages/resume-profils/resume-profils.component"; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-detail', standalone: true, imports: [ ResumeProfilsComponent ], templateUrl: './post-detail.component.html', styleUrl: './post-detail.component.scss' }) export class PostDetailComponent { }
